description:
In this mini lab I am using basic configuration to start with multicast in a small network comprising 6 routers.

I show how to prevent issues such as RPF failure and how to dynamically advertise RP assignments using Auto-RP and BSR and also I check Source-Specific-Multicast and MSDP as well.

A very detailed multicast lab is going to be ready soon and will be announced to all of the students who opted to take this course.
title: Multicast Mini-Lab
